title: New: Ocean Calling â€“ White Light
content:
Ocean Calling (Sophie Wilkie) draws the best elements of M83 (over the top, movie ready crescendos) and Grimes (more intimate, poetic lyricism) to illustrious effect.

Her newest track White Light is another epic, yet delightfully pop-aware number, perfectly suited to the spacious, picturesque environments which the majority of her photos document. Check out White Light below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
